name: Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza
desc: A pizza freshly baked from the oven. The crust is dotted with large chunks of meat and fresh mushroom slices. The sweet, stretchy cheese further adds to the charm. You have no doubt that every slice will be snatched away the moment it is served. Speed, therefore, is a gourmet's best buddy when this pizza is on the table.

customize.name: Recipe: Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza.

customize.name: Raw Meat
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of meat. Handled properly, it can be used to make delicious food.

customize.name: Flour
customize.desc: A powder ground from wheat. No matter what it goes into, it brings a sense of satisfaction to the diner.

customize.name: Mushroom
customize.desc: Hardy common fungi. Can grow anywhere with the right amount of shade and moisture.

customize.name: Cheese
customize.desc: Made from fermented milk. High in energy, it's used in a wide range of dishes.

customize.name: Delicious Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc: A pizza freshly baked in an oven. Every inch of the crust is saturated with the fatty aroma of meat. Some mushrooms have been sprinkled on top to add freshness. Just a small mouthful shall greet your taste buds with the rich scent of cheese â€” most enticing indeed. You can't help reaching for another slice before you've even finished off the one in your hand.

customize.name: Suspicious Meat Lover's Mushroom Pizza
customize.desc: A pizza freshly baked in an oven. The messy lumps of cheese and ingredients give off a greasy smell, with a rock-hard crust just to make things worse. Well, what has the poor dish gone through to end up in this state? Was it the baking time or the excessive fermentation?

value.text: Increases all party members' ATK by 272 and CRIT Rate by 8% for 300s. In Co-Op Mode, this effect only applies to your own character(s).
